title: Cuba's New Reality: A Need For MBAs
teaser: Scores of Cubans have earned MBAs, making them the little-known vanguard of Cuba’s newest revolution: learning business.
contentencoded:
This month, at the Summit of the Americas, President Obama and Raúl Castro shared the first face-to-face meeting between U.S. and Cuban presidents in almost 60 years.

The Cold War foes are restoring diplomatic relations, and one group of Cubans could play an especially important economic role.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Tim Padgett of WLRN reports.
